description: Minecraft-style stone texture with pixel-perfect gray patterns and horizontal stratification

horizontal_strata.note: Horizontal stone layers mimicking geological strata

noise_clusters.note: Small pixel clusters for stone texture detail

crack_patterns.note: Thin cracks using darkest gray pixels

highlight_spots.note: Light gray highlight pixels for depth

base_noise.note: Low-frequency noise for large stone formations

tiling_optimization.note: Ensures perfect tiling without visible seams but maintains pixel crispness

generation_algorithm.step1: Initialize 16x16 pixel grid with medium gray base
generation_algorithm.step2: Apply horizontal stratification using band patterns
generation_algorithm.step3: Generate discrete Perlin noise for large-scale stone variation
generation_algorithm.step4: Add pixel-aligned cluster noise for fine detail
generation_algorithm.step5: Place crack patterns using darkest gray pixels
generation_algorithm.step6: Add highlight spots using light gray pixels
generation_algorithm.step7: Ensure pixel-perfect edges and discrete color usage
generation_algorithm.step8: Optimize for seamless tiling across all edges
